落下了很多亏钱机会

olimpio: There's a risk of a black swan event in DeFi.
As per Defillama, if CRV drops below $0.37, there's 300M CRV to liquidate in Aave -most from Curve's founder
The problem? There's not a single Exchange or DeFi protocol where one can sell such a large CRV amount.
Risks explained 🧵

0/ Recently, intent-based infrastructure has gained popularity, and Silent is very excited to bring one of the OG projects building intent-based trading infrastructure into reality.
We present @CoWSwap, as the 3rd addition to our ecosystem of privacy-preserving applications.
